items.title: Rubio embarks on mission impossible: Retake the Panama Canal
items.description: President Trump’s secretary of state arrived in Panama City on Saturday with a brazen mandate from his boss and a wary host.

items.title: Bobby vs. Bernie: Kennedy tries to claim populist mantle on health care

items.title: Trump opened the ‘valve’ on California water. It will probably be wasted.
items.description: Experts said water released into California’s Central Valley would not reach Los Angeles.

items.title: Illinois governor bans Jan. 6 rioters pardoned by Trump from state jobs
items.description: The order would apply to more than 50 people from Illinois who were given pardons or commutations by President Donald Trump.
